code: import{CHAT_USER,ACTIVE_USER,FULL_USER,ADD_LOGGED_USER,CREATE_GROUP}from'./constants';export var chatUser=function chatUser(){return{type:CHAT_USER};};export var activeUser=function activeUser(userId){return{type:ACTIVE_USER,payload:userId};};export var setFullUser=function setFullUser(fullUser){return{type:FULL_USER,payload:fullUser};};export var addLoggedinUser=function addLoggedinUser(userData){return{type:ADD_LOGGED_USER,payload:userData};};export var createGroup=function createGroup(groupData){return{type:CREATE_GROUP,payload:groupData};};
